nodes.text: Quar Rohk was a male Trandoshan thief-for-hire that lived and operated during the Clone Wars. He was present at the Battle of Teth, attempting to steal crystalline vertex from the B'omarr Monastery on the Outer Rim planet Teth. While in the monastery, Rohk encountered a Tethan youngling.
Quar Rohk's only appearance was in The Clone Wars: Decide Your Destiny: Tethan Battle Adventure, a young readers novel published in July 2010. It was based on the Clone Wars film.
